mapper.update: UPDATE shop_reg SET confirm=1 WHERE s_num=#{s_num}
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM shop_reg WHERE u_id=#{u_id}
select s_name, thumbnail from ( select rownum rn, s_name, thumbnail from ( select * from shop_reg where confirm=0 ) where rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) where rn > (#{pageNum}-1) * #{amount}
select mr.img , mr.meat , mr.price, sr.s_name, substr(sr.s_addr,1,2) s_addr from menu_reg mr inner join shop_reg sr on mr.s_num=sr.s_num
